load libs

```{r}
library(data.table)

library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
```

get data

```{r}
# activity data
data_activity <- fread("data_sim/results/data_strategy_gen.csv")
data_activity <- data_activity[
  sim_type == "foragers" &
    regrowth == 0.01 &
    variable != "stealing"
]
```

make so called population activity budget plot

```{r}
fig_activity <-
ggplot(data_activity[gen <= 50, ]) +
  geom_path(
    aes(
      gen, value,
      colour = variable,
      group = interaction(variable, replicate)
    ),
    size = 0.3
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(
    values = c(
      foraging = "navyblue",
      handling = "seagreen"
    ),
    labels = c(foraging = "Foraging", handling = "Handling"),
    breaks = c("foraging", "handling")
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    # labels = scales::percent,
    breaks = seq(0, 1, 0.25),
    labels = c("0", "0.25", "0.5", "0.75", "1")
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = c(1, seq(10, 50, 10))
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(1, 50),
    ylim = c(0, 1),
    expand = T
  ) +
  kleptomoveMS::theme_custom(grid = T, base_size = 8) +
  theme(legend.position = "top") +
  labs(
    x = "Generation",
    y = "Prop. population time",
    colour = NULL
  )
```

figure intake

```{r}
fig_intake <-
  ggplot(
    unique(data_activity[gen <= 50, ],
           by = c("gen", "replicate", "pop_fitness")
    )
  ) +
  geom_path(
    aes(gen, pop_fitness,
        group = replicate
    ),
    size = 0.3
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = c(1, seq(10, 50, 10))
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(
    xlim = c(1, 50),
    ylim = c(0, 50),
    expand = T
  ) +
  kleptomoveMS::theme_custom(grid = T, base_size = 8) +
  labs(
    x = "Generation",
    y = "Population intake"
  )
```

prepare landscape at 0 and 25

```{r}
# get landscape data
data_land <- fread("data_sim/results/data_landscape_item_count_1_50.csv")
data_land <- data_land[sim_type == "foragers", ]

# read agent data
data_agent <- fread("data_sim/results/data_agent_count_1_50.csv")[
  sim_type == "foragers",
]
```

plot landscape foragers model

```{r}
fig_land_foragers <-
  ggplot(data_land) +
  geom_tile(aes(x, y, fill = items)) +
  geom_point(
    data = data_agent[agents > 0, ],
    aes(x, y, size = agents),
    shape = 1
  ) +
  facet_grid(~gen,
    labeller = label_both
  ) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(
    limits = c(1, NA),
    na.value = "white",
    direction = -1
  ) +
  coord_equal(expand = F) +
  kleptomoveMS::theme_custom(landscape = T) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")+
  labs(fill = "# Items", size = "# Indiv.")
```

## Figure 2 Foragers model

wrap figures together

```{r}
figure_2_forager_model <-
  wrap_plots(
    fig_activity, fig_intake, fig_land_foragers,
    design = "AB\nCC"
  ) +
    plot_annotation(
      tag_levels = "A"
    ) &
    theme(plot.tag = element_text(
      face = "bold",
      size = 12
    ))
```

save figure

```{r}
ggsave(figure_2_forager_model,
  filename = "figures/fig_02.png",
  height = 125, width = 125, units = "mm"
)
```
